recommended_action:
1. Login to Azure Portal using https://portal.azure.com
2. Go to Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
3. For this database click on Server parameters
4. Search for log_duration
5. Click ON and save
rationale: Enabling log_duration helps the PostgreSQL Database to Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement which in turn generates query and error logs. Query and error logs can be used to identify, troubleshoot, and repair configuration errors and sub-optimal performance.

value.errorMessage: SQL's logging of duration is set to off.
